title: Solar power conversion: CuI hole transport layer and Ba3NCl3 absorber enable advanced solar cell technology boosting efficiency over 30%
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24066-24081
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03695F, Paper

Avijit Ghosh, Abdullah Al Hossain Newaz, Abdullah Al Baki, Nasser S. Awwad, Hala A. Ibrahium, Mohammad Shakhawat Hossain, Md Muminur Rahman Sonic, Md Saiful Islam, Md Khaledur Rahman
Researchers are becoming more interested in novel barium-nitride-chloride (Ba3NCl3) hybrid perovskite solar cells (HPSCs) due to their remarkable semiconductor properties.
